{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

Which of the following statement is correct?          

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

Cells shrink in hypertonic solution and swell in hypotonic solution

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:907"},{"text":"

Imbibition is a special type of diffusion when water is absorbed by non-living parts.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:908"},{"text":"

Most of water flow in the roots occur via the apoplast

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1088"},{"text":"

All of these

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1093"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"CMWVZ6q8-Which of the following statement is correct?","title":"CMWVZ6q8-Which of the following statement is correct?","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"English","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Botany","qlevel":"MEDIUM","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}
